compliance.cbcrDesc: Required for multinational groups with revenue over AED 3.15 billion
compliance.policyDesc: Written transfer pricing policy covering all controlled transactions

documents.namingAdvice: Use descriptive names including document type and date

documentDescriptions.MASTER_FILE: Standardized information on the MNE group's organizational structure, business activities, intangibles, intercompany financial activities, and financial and tax position
documentDescriptions.LOCAL_FILE: Detailed information about the specific controlled transactions of the local entity
documentDescriptions.CBCR: Country-by-Country Report providing tax administration with information on global allocation of income and taxes paid
documentDescriptions.BENCHMARKING_STUDY: Economic analysis comparing controlled transaction terms with arm's length terms
documentDescriptions.ECONOMIC_ANALYSIS: Supporting economic analysis demonstrating arm's length nature of transactions
